name: Header Footer
description:
Header Footer is an arcade roguelike focused on fast-paced combat and procedural level generation. This is still very much a prototype, so all thoughts and suggestions are welcome!

Features:

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • First-person combat
  • Ragdoll physics

Controls:

  • Melee Attack: LMB
  • Range Attack:  RMB
  • Movement: WASD
  • Slide: LEFT-SHIFT
  • Menu: ESC
